radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy erythema and mucosal edema up to the hepatic flexure.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At age 8 years and 8 months, a repeat colonoscopy showed a granulomatous mass in the rectum consistent with digital trauma.

radiographic_examinations.findings: A granulomatous mass in the rectum consistent with digital trauma.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient has had quiescent disease since.
